text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1904 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ; December * Adolf Østbye, revue artist, made the first gramophone record in Norway. ==Deaths== ; September * 31 – Sigurd Lie, violinist, composer, and orchestra conductor (born 1871). ==Births== ; September * 7 – Ernst Glaser, violinist, orchestra conductor, and music teacher (died 1979). ; September * 7 – Ragnar Steen, guitarist (died 1958). ; October * 26 – Torbjørn Knutsen, composer and violinist (died 1987). ==See also== * 1904 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1900s in Norwegian music
title: 1904 in Norwegian music
